sentences.sContent: There is no magic formula explaining our attraction to architecture, construction, destruction, cultures and urbanism.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is no magic formula explaining our attraction to architecture, construction, destruction, cultures and urbanism.
sentences.sCn: 没有魔法公式能够解释建筑物、建筑、毁坏、文化和都市生活对我们的吸引力。

sentences.sContent: I don’t read the language here in Beijing, but it is indeed beautiful. If only I didn’t know anything about architecture and urbanism.
sentences.sContent_eng: I don’t read the language here in Beijing, but it is indeed beautiful. If only I didn’t know anything about architecture and urbanism.
sentences.sCn: 我不懂北京的语言，但它确实很美，只要我不懂建筑和都市生活。
